import { useState } from "react" import { Row } from "../../row/row" export const Showtable=()=>{ const [listfrute,setlistfrute]=useState([ {name:"תפוח",color:"green"}, {name:"ענבים",color:"green"}, {name:"לימונים",color:"yellow"}, {name:"אפרסקים",color:"red"} ]) const del=(name)=>{ setlistfrute(listfrute.filter(r=>r.name!=na)) } return {listfrute.map(m=>( )) }

}
